title: Mystery Science Theater 3000 MST3K Season07 DVDrip AVC AC3 VOL36
description:
Mystery Science Theater 3000 MST3K Season07 DVDrip AVC AC3 VOL36

ADDED NEW VOL36-SHOUT 704 THE INCREDIBLE MELTING MAN

NEW NAMING SCHEME TO ACCOUNT FOR SHOUT VOLUME RE-ISSUES
PLEASE BE CAREFUL TO ONLY DOWNLOAD THE FILES YOU NEED

The goal of these AVC encodes is to reproduce the same picture as seen when viewing the DVD but with a smaller file size. This means there was no cropping so you may see small black bars around the picture's edge. This is exactly what is seen on the DVD source. The problem with cropping MST3Ks is that cropping based on the movie usually over-crops the SOL segments, sometimes a lot. Plus, automatically cropping can pull the picture out of its correct aspect ratio. So these encodes have no cropping, RF=20 constant quality video and AC3 passthru so the audio is identical to the DVD.

Video: AVC encode
Width 720, Anamorphic Loose, Copping Manual 0 0 0 0
Deinterlace=Slower
FPS 29.97 Constant, Preset=Very Slow, Quality RF=20.0
Audio: AC3 Passthru 192Kbps

titles with subs have them set off by default
all movie titles have chapters
